Text:

Thx poster.

therefore I must use ZbigZ (size limited.) to get at individual files
Many many thanks for the U/L! Do they still include a .pdf of the recipes on the discs? That was always handy in years past if you miss a measurement or some such in the vid.
Excellent, thanks so much.  Any more would equally appreciated!
